text: » Periodontitis (periodontal disease) — Neglected gingivitis can escalate to disease — Immune cells attack not only bacterial intruders, but also body tissues + Can destroy periodontal ligament « Can activate osteoclasts, which leads to dissolving of bone and possible tooth loss — May increase heart disease and stroke two ways: » Promotes atherosclerotic plaque formation + Bacteria entering blood can cause clot formation in coronary and cerebral arteries — Risk factors: smoking, diabetes mellitus, oral piercings
